The Chancellor should in future have the right to attend when the quality of bread and ale in the market was assayed by the Mayor.

In1255 a charter granted by the King at Woodstock increased the staff os city officials by four aldermen and eight associates. No regrators were allowed to buy any victuals in or about the town, as they were brought thither, nor buy anything and sell it again before nine in the morning.
